title: Zombie Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Body-double   Carefree Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Royalty   Seduction   System Administrator   Transmigration   Zombies
author: 九天画糖
description:
The reign of the zombie queen ended, and her soul transmigrated into an ancient historical novel. She thought she could finally be a human and enjoy food. But, the stupid system sent by the heaven said–

”Your food experience is over. You’re in a zombie state. I ask the host to work hard to gain hatred points of the male and female lead of the novel. Every 1 point of hate value can be exchanged for 1 minute of delicious food. Come on host!”

Luo Fu: “… gain hatred points.  Sounds good!”

This is a story of a vicious female who constantly gains hatred but remains alive and eats happily.>
